729.quote: I began revolution with 82 men. If I had to do it again, I do it with 10 or 15 and absolute faith. It does not matter how small you are if you have faith and plan of action.
729.author: Fidel Castro

730.quote: Believe in yourself! Have faith in your abilities! Without a humble but reasonable confidence in your own powers you cannot be successful or happy.
730.author: Norman Vincent Peale

731.quote: Optimism is the faith that leads to achievement. Nothing can be done without hope and confidence.
731.author: Helen Keller

732.quote: I believe if you keep your faith, you keep your trust, you keep the right attitude, if you're grateful, you'll see God open up new doors.
732.author: Joel Osteen

733.quote: Sometimes life hits you in the head with a brick. Don't lose faith.
733.author: Steve Jobs

734.quote: Keep your dreams alive. Understand to achieve anything requires faith and belief in yourself, vision, hard work, determination, and dedication. Remember all things are possible for those who believe.
734.author: Gail Devers

735.quote: Always be yourself, express yourself, have faith in yourself, do not go out and look for a successful personality and duplicate it.
735.author: Bruce Lee

736.quote: Be faithful in small things because it is in them that your strength lies.
736.author: Mother Teresa

737.quote: You must not lose faith in humanity. Humanity is an ocean; if a few drops of the ocean are dirty, the ocean does not become dirty.
737.author: Mahatma Gandhi

738.quote: When you focus on being a blessing, God makes sure that you are always blessed in abundance.
738.author: Joel Osteen

739.quote: Faith is taking the first step even when you don't see the whole staircase.
739.author: Martin Luther King, Jr.

740.quote: The greatest legacy one can pass on to one's children and grandchildren is not money or other material things accumulated in one's life, but rather a legacy of character and faith.
740.author: Billy Graham

741.quote: Faith is the strength by which a shattered world shall emerge into the light.
741.author: Helen Keller

742.quote: Faith is the bird that feels the light when the dawn is still dark.
742.author: Rabindranath Tagore

743.quote: In my deepest, darkest moments, what really got me through was a prayer. Sometimes my prayer was 'Help me.' Sometimes a prayer was 'Thank you.' What I've discovered is that intimate connection and communication with my creator will always get me through because I know my support, my help, is just a prayer away.
743.author: Iyanla Vanzant

744.quote: Observe good faith and justice toward all nations. Cultivate peace and harmony with all.
744.author: George Washington

745.quote: Feelings aroused by the touch of someone's hand, the sound of music, the smell of a flower, a beautiful sunset, a work of art, love, laughter, hope and faith - all work on both the unconscious and the conscious aspects of the self, and they have physiological consequences as well.
745.author: Bernie Siegel

746.quote: To have faith is to trust yourself to the water. When you swim you don't grab hold of the water, because if you do you will sink and drown. Instead you relax, and float.
746.author: Alan Watts

747.quote: The keys to patience are acceptance and faith. Accept things as they are, and look realistically at the world around you. Have faith in yourself and in the direction you have chosen.
747.author: Ralph Marston

748.quote: I write about the power of trying, because I want to be okay with failing. I write about generosity because I battle selfishness. I write about joy because I know sorrow. I write about faith because I almost lost mine, and I know what it is to be broken and in need of redemption. I write about gratitude because I am thankful - for all of it.
748.author: Kristin Armstrong

749.quote: True equality means holding everyone accountable in the same way, regardless of race, gender, faith, ethnicity - or political ideology.
749.author: Monica Crowley

750.quote: Believe in yourself, and the rest will fall into place. Have faith in your own abilities, work hard, and there is nothing you cannot accomplish.
750.author: Brad Henry

751.quote: I have no faith in human perfectability. I think that human exertion will have no appreciable effect upon humanity. Man is now only more active - not more happy - nor more wise, than he was 6000 years ago.
751.author: Edgar Allan Poe

752.quote: A grateful heart is a beginning of greatness. It is an expression of humility. It is a foundation for the development of such virtues as prayer, faith, courage, contentment, happiness, love, and well-being.
752.author: James E. Faust

753.quote: Faith is to believe what you do not see; the reward of this faith is to see what you believe.
753.author: Saint Augustine

754.quote: To have faith doesn't mean you get any less frustrated when you don't do your best, but you know that it's not life and death. Take what you're given, and when you continue to work hard, you will see results. That will give you the confidence you need to keep going.
754.author: Tom Lehman

755.quote: Religion is part of the human make-up. It's also part of our cultural and intellectual history. Religion was our first attempt at literature, the texts, our first attempt at cosmology, making sense of where we are in the universe, our first attempt at health care, believing in faith healing, our first attempt at philosophy.
755.author: Christopher Hitchens

756.quote: Indeed, this life is a test. It is a test of many things - of our convictions and priorities, our faith and our faithfulness, our patience and our resilience, and in the end, our ultimate desires.
756.author: Sheri L. Dew

757.quote: As you keep your mind and heart focused in the right direction, approaching each day with faith and gratitude, I believe you will be empowered to live life to the fullest and enjoy the abundant life He has promised you!
757.author: Victoria Osteen

758.quote: Through hard work, perseverance and a faith in God, you can live your dreams.
758.author: Ben Carson

759.quote: It's lack of faith that makes people afraid of meeting challenges, and I believed in myself.
759.author: Muhammad Ali

760.quote: We are twice armed if we fight with faith.
760.author: Plato

761.quote: Technology is nothing. What's important is that you have a faith in people, that they're basically good and smart, and if you give them tools, they'll do wonderful things with them.
761.author: Steve Jobs

762.quote: I am still far from being what I want to be, but with God's help I shall succeed.
762.author: Vincent Van Gogh

763.quote: With faith, discipline and selfless devotion to duty, there is nothing worthwhile that you cannot achieve.
763.author: Muhammad Ali Jinnah

764.quote: No human race is superior; no religious faith is inferior. All collective judgments are wrong. Only racists make them.
764.author: Elie Wiesel

765.quote: Faith is permitting ourselves to be seized by the things we do not see.
765.author: Martin Luther

766.quote: God will never give you anything you can't handle, so don't stress.
766.author: Kelly Clarkson

767.quote: The foundation stones for a balanced success are honesty, character, integrity, faith, love and loyalty.
767.author: Zig Ziglar

768.quote: Without faith, nothing is possible. With it, nothing is impossible.
768.author: Mary McLeod Bethune

769.quote: I am a bit of a hopeless romantic. I really do have a faith and a belief in love, and when I love, I love hard.
769.author: Melanie Fiona

770.quote: A wise ruler ought never to keep faith when by doing so it would be against his interests.
770.author: Niccolo Machiavelli

771.quote: Take a leap of faith and begin this wondrous new year by believing. Believe in yourself. And believe that there is a loving Source - a Sower of Dreams - just waiting to be asked to help you make your dreams come true.
771.author: Sarah Ban Breathnach

772.quote: Pray as though everything depended on God. Work as though everything depended on you.
772.author: Saint Augustine

773.quote: God has already done everything He's going to do. The ball is now in your court. If you want success, if you want wisdom, if you want to be prosperous and healthy, you're going to have to do more than meditate and believe; you must boldly declare words of faith and victory over yourself and your family.
773.author: Joel Osteen

774.quote: If you have God on your side, everything becomes clear.
774.author: Ayrton Senna

775.quote: My mother was a piano teacher, my father an inventor. He invented the reflective paint they still use on airstrips. They had faith in my ambition, and I think that made all the difference.
775.author: Chuck Close

776.quote: Nor shall derision prove powerful against those who listen to humanity or those who follow in the footsteps of divinity, for they shall live forever. Forever.
776.author: Khalil Gibran

777.quote: Before the throne of the Almighty, man will be judged not by his acts but by his intentions. For God alone reads our hearts.
777.author: Mahatma Gandhi

778.quote: It is truer to say that martyrs create faith more than faith creates martyrs.
778.author: Miguel de Unamuno

779.quote: To one who has faith, no explanation is necessary. To one without faith, no explanation is possible.
779.author: Thomas Aquinas

780.quote: I think faith is incredibly important because you will become overwhelmed with what's happening and you will have waves of grief, but when you turn to your faith, I believe God will give you waves of grace to get through it.
780.author: Joel Osteen

781.quote: People who believe they have the power to exercise some measure of control over their lives are healthier, more effective and more successful than those who lack faith in their ability to effect changes in their lives.
781.author: Albert Bandura

782.quote: Liberty cannot be established without morality, nor morality without faith.
782.author: Alexis de Tocqueville

783.quote: It is a great consolation for me to remember that the Lord, to whom I had drawn near in humble and child-like faith, has suffered and died for me, and that He will look on me in love and compassion.
783.author: Wolfgang Amadeus Mozart

784.quote: The other day the President said, I know you've had some rough times, and I want to do something that will show the nation what faith that I have in you, in your maturity and sense of responsibility. He paused, then said, would you like a puppy?
784.author: Dan Quayle

785.quote: I have great faith in fools; self-confidence my friends call it.
785.author: Edgar Allan Poe

786.quote: Faith is the great cop-out, the great excuse to evade the need to think and evaluate evidence. Faith is belief in spite of, even perhaps because of, the lack of evidence.
786.author: Richard Dawkins

787.quote: Faith makes all things possible... love makes all things easy.
787.author: Dwight L. Moody

788.quote: The issue of equal rights for lesbian, gay, bisexual and transgender individuals has vexed politicians for decades. I have my own cloudy history with the issue, having supported a law in Mississippi that made it illegal for LGBT couples to adopt children. I believed at the time this was a principled position based on my faith.
788.author: Ronnie Musgrove

789.quote: Many have a vague idea that they must make some wonderful effort in order to gain the favor of God. But all self-dependence is vain. It is only by connecting with Jesus through faith that the sinner becomes a hopeful, believing child of God.
789.author: Ellen G. White

790.quote: For most of us, the great danger is not that we will renounce our faith. It is that we will become so distracted and rushed and preoccupied that we will settle for a mediocre version of it. We will just skim our lives instead of actually living them.
790.author: John Ortberg

791.quote: In a democracy, dissent is an act of faith.
791.author: J. William Fulbright

792.quote: Happy is the son whose faith in his mother remains unchallenged.
792.author: Louisa May Alcott

793.quote: Faith and prayer are the vitamins of the soul; man cannot live in health without them.
793.author: Mahalia Jackson

794.quote: Machiavelli's teaching would hardly have stood the test of Parliamentary government, for public discussion demands at least the profession of good faith.
794.author: Lord Acton

795.quote: I believe though I do not comprehend, and I hold by faith what I cannot grasp with the mind.
795.author: Saint Bernard

796.quote: Remember the sufferings of Christ, the storms that were weathered... the crown that came from those sufferings which gave new radiance to the faith... All saints give testimony to the truth that without real effort, no one ever wins the crown.
796.author: Thomas Becket

797.quote: We have all sinned and fall short of the glory of God. So when we are in the mess, remember Jesus made it right. We got to hang on to that by faith.
797.author: Jud Wilhite

798.quote: I just want to grow spiritually with the Lord. I'm keeping strong at it, just trying to make my walk with faith a little better.
798.author: Kevin Durant

799.quote: It is the job of the historian to say what is likely, and of faith to say what is possible.
799.author: Reza Aslan

800.quote: As members of Congress, we take an oath to uphold the Constitution and bear true faith and allegiance to the United States, not the Republican or Democratic party. I have been willing to stand up to my own leadership when it's in the national interest.
800.author: Jackie Speier

801.quote: God never made a promise that was too good to be true.
801.author: Dwight L. Moody

802.quote: There are many things that are essential to arriving at true peace of mind, and one of the most important is faith, which cannot be acquired without prayer.
802.author: John Wooden

803.quote: A man of courage is also full of faith.
803.author: Marcus Tullius Cicero

804.quote: Doubt is not the opposite of faith; it is one element of faith.
804.author: Paul Tillich

805.quote: Faith consists in believing when it is beyond the power of reason to believe.
805.author: Voltaire

806.quote: Now, God be praised, that to believing souls gives light in darkness, comfort in despair.
806.author: William Shakespeare

807.quote: Faith gives you an inner strength and a sense of balance and perspective in life.
807.author: Gregory Peck

808.quote: Of all the things Christ wants for us, loving Him and focusing our attention on Him are the most important.
808.author: Charles Stanley

809.quote: Anybody who has been seriously engaged in scientific work of any kind realizes that over the entrance to the gates of the temple of science are written the words: 'Ye must have faith.'
809.author: Max Planck

810.quote: I have always marveled that so many religions exact such revenge against dissenters. It only weakens the appeal of their faith and contradicts any claims they might have made that 'all religions are basically the same.'
810.author: Ravi Zacharias

811.quote: Christ commands those who believe to be baptized. Pedobaptists adopt a system which tends to preclude the baptism of believers. They baptize the involuntary infant and deprive him of the privilege of ever professing his faith in the appointed way. If this system were universally adopted, it would banish believers' baptism out of the world.
811.author: Adoniram Judson

812.quote: You block your dream when you allow your fear to grow bigger than your faith.
812.author: Mary Manin Morrissey

813.quote: To be an atheist requires an indefinitely greater measure of faith than to recieve all the great truths which atheism would deny.
813.author: Joseph Addison

814.quote: My faith always has been and always will be important to me.
814.author: Aretha Franklin

815.quote: Faith is the first factor in a life devoted to service. Without it, nothing is possible. With it, nothing is impossible.
815.author: Mary McLeod Bethune

816.quote: It is only by risking our persons from one hour to another that we live at all. And often enough our faith beforehand in an uncertified result is the only thing that makes the result come true.
816.author: William James

817.quote: There is nothing wrong with America that faith, love of freedom, intelligence, and energy of her citizens cannot cure.
817.author: Dwight D. Eisenhower

818.quote: It's faith in something and enthusiasm for something that makes a life worth living.
818.author: Oliver Wendell Holmes, Sr.

819.quote: No lover, if he be of good faith, and sincere, will deny he would prefer to see his mistress dead than unfaithful.
819.author: Marquis de Sade

820.quote: The past is a source of knowledge, and the future is a source of hope. Love of the past implies faith in the future.
820.author: Stephen Ambrose

821.quote: Blind faith, no matter how passionately expressed, will not suffice. Science for its part will test relentlessly every assumption about the human condition.
821.author: E. O. Wilson

822.quote: Put your faith in God and confidence in yourself.
822.author: Alberta Hunter

823.quote: I ground my faith upon God's word, and not upon the church.
823.author: Jane Grey

824.quote: A person who has sympathy for mankind in the lump, faith in its future progress, and desire to serve the great cause of this progress, should be called not a humanist, but a humanitarian, and his creed may be designated as humanitarianism.
824.author: Irving Babbitt

825.quote: It's a war of attrition. If you have patience and a modicum of faith in yourself your chances are not too bad.
825.author: Julie Bowen

826.quote: In the last analysis, of course, an oath will encourage fidelity in office only to the degree that officeholders continue to believe that they cannot escape ultimate accountability for a breach of faith.
826.author: James L. Buckley

827.quote: It comes with faith, for with complete faith there is no fear of what faces you in life or death.
827.author: Jacqueline Cochran

828.quote: Amidst the confusion of the times, the conflicts of conscience, and the turmoil of daily living, an abiding faith becomes an anchor to our lives.
828.author: Thomas S. Monson

829.quote: I wasn't with Joseph, but I believe him. My faith did not come to me through science, and I will not permit so-called science to destroy it.
829.author: Thomas S. Monson

830.quote: Should doubt knock at your doorway, just say to those skeptical, disturbing, rebellious thoughts, I propose to stay with my faith, with the faith of my people.
830.author: Thomas S. Monson

831.quote: A witness, in the sense that I am using the word, is a man whose life and faith are so completely one that when the challenge comes to step out and testify for his faith, he does so, disregarding all risks, accepting all consequences.
831.author: Whittaker Chambers

832.quote: If he have faith, the believer cannot be restrained. He betrays himself. He breaks out. He confesses and teaches this gospel to the people at the risk of life itself.
832.author: Martin Luther

833.quote: When you have put all your faith in man and continue to be disappointed, don't you hope there is something out of there that is not of human element?
833.author: Natalie Cole

834.quote: Faith, there hath been many great men that have flattered the people who ne'er loved them.
834.author: William Shakespeare

835.quote: Anyone who is to find Christ must first find the church. How could anyone know where Christ is and what faith is in him unless he knew where his believers are?
835.author: Martin Luther

836.quote: I still have a belief and a faith that some great things are still going to happen in my career. If I didn't believe that, it makes no sense for me to be out there, and on top of that, I know this is a period of time that God wants me to persevere through.
836.author: Michael Chang

837.quote: The difficulties we face originate from one of three sources. Some are sent to us by the Lord to test our faith, others are the result of Satan's attacks, and still others are due to our own sinful choices.
837.author: Charles Stanley

838.quote: Sigmund Freud was the apostle of disbelief. He was the one who made psychoanalysis a part of our culture, and in so doing he kicked out a flying buttress that had been essential for holding up our cathedral of faith.
838.author: Tony Campolo

839.quote: It's okay to have faith in something that you can't see or touch.
839.author: Chad Kroeger

840.quote: Any of us can be happy and have a good attitude when everything is going our way. But I believe it's the real test of your character and of your faith to say, 'Things are not going our way, but I'm still being good to people; I'm still attending church; I still have a good attitude.'
840.author: Joel Osteen

841.quote: When the faith is strong enough, it is sufficient just to be. It's a journey towards simplicity, towards quietness, towards a kind of joy that is not in time. It's a journey that has taken us from primary identification with our body and our psyche, on to an identification with God, and ultimately beyond identification.
841.author: Ram Dass

842.quote: Let me say that I consider myself a deep believer in the reality of God. I might define God quite differently from the way some people in the Christian faith would do so, but I do not doubt the reality of that experience.
842.author: John Shelby Spong

843.quote: My characters tend to be more dynamic because they're reaching that point in their lives where their old way of being is breaking down. They're conflicted by the idea that they don't know what's next. You could call it Kierkegaard's leap of faith, when you get tired of sort of reinventing yourself on a very superficial level.
843.author: Chuck Palahniuk

844.quote: I would suggest that faith is everyone's business. The advance or decline of faith is so intimately connected to the welfare of a society that it should be of particular interest to a politician.
844.author: William Wilberforce

845.quote: For a believer, Christian faith is true to the human heart, not in the sense that any old thing we fancy believing in will become conveniently true - but because the complicated truth about our hearts, as we struggle to perceive it, tells us what we are and where we are, and consequently what we need.
845.author: Francis Spufford

846.quote: It's an article of faith that the novels I've loved will live inside me forever.
846.author: Pat Conroy

847.quote: That deep emotional conviction of the presence of a superior reasoning power, which is revealed in the incomprehensible universe, forms my idea of God.
847.author: Albert Einstein

848.quote: In faith there is enough light for those who want to believe and enough shadows to blind those who don't.
848.author: Blaise Pascal

849.quote: Belief is a wise wager. Granted that faith cannot be proved, what harm will come to you if you gamble on its truth and it proves false? If you gain, you gain all; if you lose, you lose nothing. Wager, then, without hesitation, that He exists.
849.author: Blaise Pascal

850.quote: I gave in, and admitted that God was God.
850.author: C. S. Lewis

851.quote: Prayer should be the key of the day and the lock of the night.
851.author: George Herbert

852.quote: Doubt is a pain too lonely to know that faith is his twin brother.
852.author: Khalil Gibran

853.quote: Faith is an oasis in the heart which will never be reached by the caravan of thinking.
853.author: Khalil Gibran

854.quote: Faith is a knowledge within the heart, beyond the reach of proof.
854.author: Khalil Gibran

855.quote: Faith is not something to grasp, it is a state to grow into.
855.author: Mahatma Gandhi

856.quote: There is nothing that wastes the body like worry, and one who has any faith in God should be ashamed to worry about anything whatsoever.
856.author: Mahatma Gandhi

857.quote: If patience is worth anything, it must endure to the end of time. And a living faith will last in the midst of the blackest storm.
857.author: Mahatma Gandhi

858.quote: Be a sinner and sin strongly, but more strongly have faith and rejoice in Christ.
858.author: Martin Luther

859.quote: All who call on God in true faith, earnestly from the heart, will certainly be heard, and will receive what they have asked and desired.
859.author: Martin Luther

861.quote: Knowledge is only one half. Faith is the other.
861.author: Novalis

862.quote: The dearest friend on earth is a mere shadow compared to Jesus Christ.
862.author: Oswald Chambers

863.quote: Belief in a cruel God makes a cruel man.
863.author: Thomas Paine

864.quote: To believe in God is impossible not to believe in Him is absurd.
864.author: Voltaire

865.quote: Faith means belief in something concerning which doubt is theoretically possible.
865.author: William James

866.quote: The love of heaven makes one heavenly.
866.author: William Shakespeare

868.quote: If you believe in God, He will open the windows of heaven and pour blessings upon you.
868.author: Mahalia Jackson

869.quote: Faith is not simply a patience that passively suffers until the storm is past. Rather, it is a spirit that bears things - with resignations, yes, but above all, with blazing, serene hope.
869.author: Corazon Aquino

870.quote: Faith activates God - Fear activates the Enemy.
870.author: Joel Osteen

871.quote: God didn't make a mistake when He made you. You need to see yourself as God sees you.
871.author: Joel Osteen

872.quote: Faith is about trusting God when you have unanswered questions.
872.author: Joel Osteen

873.quote: I die the king's faithful servant, but God's first.
873.author: Thomas More

874.quote: He wants you all to Himself to put His loving, divine arms around you.
874.author: Charles Stanley

875.quote: I live and love in God's peculiar light.
875.author: Michelangelo

876.quote: You were made by God and for God, and until you understand that, life will never make sense.
876.author: Rick Warren

877.quote: Fight the good fight of faith, and God will give you spiritual mercies.
877.author: George Whitefield

878.quote: Man, I just feel blessed... I was in a situation where the only way I could come out of it was by putting my faith in God. No matter how good my lawyers were, no matter how much celebrity I had, everything was just stacked up against me.
878.author: Sean Combs

879.quote: What does God the Father look like? Although I've never seen Him, I believe - as with the Holy Spirit - He looks like Jesus looked on earth.
879.author: Benny Hinn

880.quote: Put your nose into the Bible everyday. It is your spiritual food. And then share it. Make a vow not to be a lukewarm Christian.
880.author: Kirk Cameron

881.quote: Faith is the substance of hope - of things hoped for and the evidence of things not seen. So if you can hope for it and imagine it, and keep imagining and hoping and seeing yourself driving a new car, or seeing yourself getting that job, or seeing yourself excel, seeing yourself help that person - that is faith.
881.author: Duane Chapman

882.quote: God continues to work miracles in my life.
882.author: Willie Aames

883.quote: I do respect people's faith, but I don't respect their manipulation of that faith in order to create fear and control.
883.author: Javier Bardem

884.quote: Faith has to do with things that are not seen and hope with things that are not at hand.
884.author: Thomas Aquinas

885.quote: Resist your fear; fear will never lead to you a positive end. Go for your faith and what you believe.
885.author: T. D. Jakes

886.quote: Oh, it is wonderful to know that our Heavenly Father loves us - even with all our flaws! His love is such that even should we give up on ourselves, He never will.
886.author: Joseph B. Wirthlin

887.quote: The truth is that killing innocent people is always wrong - and no argument or excuse, no matter how deeply believed, can ever make it right. No religion on earth condones the killing of innocent people; no faith tradition tolerates the random killing of our brothers and sisters on this earth.
887.author: Feisal Abdul Rauf

888.quote: Many churches of all persuasions are hiring research agencies to poll neighborhoods, asking what kind of church they prefer. Then the local churches design themselves to fit the desires of the people. True faith in God that demands selflessness is being replaced by trendy religion that serves the selfish.
888.author: Billy Graham

889.quote: I wouldn't ever say if you're having tough times then there must be something wrong with you or your attitude. Life's a fight. It's a good fight of faith. I encourage people to stay up, stay hopeful, stay faith-filled.
889.author: Joel Osteen

890.quote: That is not to say that we can relax our readiness to defend ourselves. Our armament must be adequate to the needs, but our faith is not primarily in these machines of defense but in ourselves.
890.author: Chester W. Nimitz

891.quote: I committed my life to Christ, and that faith has been most important to me ever since.
891.author: Peyton Manning

892.quote: One of the things I learned the hard way was that it doesn't pay to get discouraged. Keeping busy and making optimism a way of life can restore your faith in yourself.
892.author: Lucille Ball

893.quote: Many are needed to plant and water what has been planted now that the faith has spread so far and there are so many people... No matter who plants or waters, God gives no harvest unless what is planted is the faith of Peter and unless he agrees to his teachings.
893.author: Thomas Becket

894.quote: My family, frankly, they weren't folks who went to church every week. My mother was one of the most spiritual people I knew but she didn't raise me in the church, so I came to my Christian faith later in life and it was because the precepts of Jesus Christ spoke to me in terms of the kind of life that I would want to lead.
894.author: Barack Obama

895.quote: Growing up around Amish farmland, I enjoyed the opportunity to witness firsthand their love of family, of the domestic arts - sewing, quilting, cooking, baking - as well as seeing them live out their tradition of faith in such a unique way.
895.author: Beverly Lewis

896.quote: My parents shared not only an improbable love, they shared an abiding faith in the possibilities of this nation. They would give me an African name, Barack, or blessed, believing that in a tolerant America your name is no barrier to success.
896.author: Barack Obama

897.quote: My coming to faith did not start with a leap but rather a series of staggers from what seemed like one safe place to another. Like lily pads, round and green, these places summoned and then held me up while I grew. Each prepared me for the next leaf on which I would land, and in this way I moved across the swamp of doubt and fear.
897.author: Anne Lamott

898.quote: Faith that it's not always in your hands or things don't always go the way you planned, but you have to have faith that there is a plan for you, and you must follow your heart and believe in yourself no matter what.
898.author: Martina McBride

899.quote: Faith in the Lord Jesus Christ is the foundation upon which sincere and meaningful repentance must be built. If we truly seek to put away sin, we must first look to Him who is the Author of our salvation.
899.author: Ezra Taft Benson

900.quote: Among the many signs of a lively faith and hope we have in eternal life, one of the surest is not being overly sad at the death of those whom we dearly love in our Lord.
900.author: Saint Ignatius

901.quote: Humble prayer to our Heavenly Father, in deep faith in Jesus Christ, is essential to qualify us for the companionship of the Holy Ghost.
901.author: Henry B. Eyring

902.quote: Having a Christian worldview shapes my decision-making with respect to all aspects of my life. I always respect people in public life who are principled, and those principles have to be connected to something. And my faith is what serves as the anchor and directs my actions.
902.author: John Thune

903.quote: Practice means to perform, over and over again in the face of all obstacles, some act of vision, of faith, of desire. Practice is a means of inviting the perfection desired.
903.author: Martha Graham

904.quote: Comedy is an escape, not from truth but from despair; a narrow escape into faith.
904.author: Christopher Fry

905.quote: Each of us has an inner dream that we can unfold if we will just have the courage to admit what it is. And the faith to trust our own admission. The admitting is often very difficult.
905.author: Julia Cameron

906.quote: Anyone who knows history, particularly the history of Europe, will, I think, recognize that the domination of education or of government by any one particular religious faith is never a happy arrangement for the people.
906.author: Eleanor Roosevelt

907.quote: The mysteries of faith are degraded if they are made into an object of affirmation and negation, when in reality they should be an object of contemplation.
907.author: Simone Weil

908.quote: Flatter not thyself in thy faith in God if thou hast not charity for thy neighbor.
908.author: Francis Quarles

909.quote: A faith is something you die for, a doctrine is something you kill for. There is all the difference in the world.
909.author: Tony Benn

910.quote: Non-violence is the article of faith.
910.author: Mahatma Gandhi
